SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppConfig
Configuration class responsible for defining beans related to authentication, user details, and password encoding within the movie booking application.
AuthController
This is a controller class for authentication purposes.
AuthenticationRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request for user authentication.
AuthenticationResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a response after user authentication.
BookedSeats
Represents the model for storing information about booked seats for a show.
BookedSeatsNotFoundException
Custom exception indicating that booked seats information was not found.
BookedSeatsOverlap
Custom exception indicating that booked seats overlap.
BookedSeatsRepository
Repository interface for managing operations related to booked seats in the database.
Booking
Represents the model for storing information about a booking.
BookingController
This is a controller class for the booking of the seats.
BookingRepository
Repository interface for managing operations related to bookings in the database.
BookingRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request for booking seats for a show.
BookingResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a response after successful booking of seats for a show.
BookingService
Service interface defining operations related to bookings within the movie booking system.
BookingServiceImpl
Implementation of the BookingService interface, handling booking-related operations.
Constants
Class containing commonly used constant values used across the application.
CustomUserDetailsService
Custom implementation of Spring Security's UserDetailsService interface.
EmailIdConstraint
Custom validation constraint for verifying the validity of an email address.
EmailSender
Utility class to handle sending OTPs via email.
InvalidJwtAuthenticationException
Custom exception indicating an invalid JWT authentication.
JwtService
Service interface defining operations related to JWT (JSON Web Token) handling.
JwtServiceImpl
Service implementation for JWT (JSON Web Token) generation and handling.
JwtTokenFilter
JWT Token Filter is responsible for filtering incoming HTTP requests to validate and process JWT tokens for authentication purposes.
Movie
Represents the model for storing information about a movie.
MoviebookingApplication
The main entry point for the Movie Booking application.
MovieController
This is a controller class for the creation of movies.
MovieRepository
Repository interface for managing operations related to movies in the database.
MovieRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request for adding a new movie.
MovieResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a response after retrieving movie details.
MovieService
Service interface defining operations related to movies.
MovieServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing movies.
NameConstraint
Custom validation constraint for verifying the validity of a user's name.
OtpGenerator
Utility class responsible for generating OTPs (One-Time Passwords).
PasswordConstraint
Custom validation constraint for verifying the validity of a user's password.
RedisConfig
Configuration class responsible for setting up and configuring Redis for caching purposes within the movie booking application.
SecurityConfig
Configuration class responsible for setting up and configuring security measures, including authentication and authorization, within the movie booking application.
Show
Represents the model for storing information about a show.
ShowController
This is a controller class for the creation of shows.
ShowRepository
Repository interface for managing operations related to shows in the database.
ShowRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request to schedule a show.
ShowResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a response after retrieving show details.
ShowService
Service interface defining operations related to movie shows.
ShowServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing movie shows.
Theatre
Represents the model for storing information about a theatre.
TheatreController
This is a controller class for the creation of theatres.
TheatreRepository
Repository interface for managing operations related to theatres in the database.
TheatreRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request to add a new theatre.
TheatreResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a response after retrieving theatre details.
TheatreService
Service interface responsible for managing theaters in the movie booking system.
TheatreServiceImpl
Service implementation for managing theatre entities.
User
Represents the model for storing information about a user.
UserController
This is a controller class for getting information of the user.
UsernameConstraint
Custom validation constraint for verifying the validity of a user's username.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing operations related to users in the database.
UserRequest
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a request for user creation or update.
UserService
Service interface responsible for user-related operations in the movie booking system.
UserServiceImpl
Service implementation for handling user-related operations like registration, authentication, password reset, and OTP verification.
Utils
Utility class that provides transformation methods for DTOs and entities, as well as some helper functions related to user authentication and roles.
